Sentencas: Ruddlesden-Popper-type La2NiO4+delta oxide is considered as a potential cathode for solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Effect of the cobalt content on properties of La2Ni1-xCoxO4+δ

Sentencas: In this work, the tailoring possibility of the cathode material properties by doping with a small amount of Co has been investigated.
Titulo: Effect of the cobalt content on properties of La2Ni1-xCoxO4+δ

Sentencas: The initial powders were synthesized by the self-propagating high-temperature synthesis method.
Titulo: Effect of the cobalt content on properties of La2Ni1-xCoxO4+δ

Sentencas: The sintering kinetics, thermal expansion, electrical conductivity, catalytic activity of La2Ni1-xCoxO4+delta (0 <= x <= 0.3) as well as their interaction with Zr0.84Y0.16O2-delta (YSZ) and Ce0.73Gd0.27O2-delta (GDC) electrolytes have been studied.
Titulo: Effect of the cobalt content on properties of La2Ni1-xCoxO4+δ

Sentencas: It was shown that the coefficient of thermal expansion of the investigated compositions increases with increasing the Co content.
Titulo: Effect of the cobalt content on properties of La2Ni1-xCoxO4+δ

Sentencas: The Co doping leads to decreasing of La2Ni1-xCoxO4+delta conductivity in the temperature range below 600 degrees C, whereas at higher temperatures, compositions with x = 0.2 and 0.3 have higher conductivity than La2NiO4.
Titulo: Effect of the cobalt content on properties of La2Ni1-xCoxO4+δ

Sentencas: The polarization resistance of the cathodes in contact with YSZ increases with increasing the Co content.
Titulo: Effect of the cobalt content on properties of La2Ni1-xCoxO4+δ

Sentencas: However, in contact with GDC the La2Ni0.8Co0.2O4+delta composition has the lowest polarization resistance of 0.4 Omega cm(2) (at 800 degrees C), which is 1.5 times less than that of La2NiO4+delta.
Titulo: Effect of the cobalt content on properties of La2Ni1-xCoxO4+δ

Sentencas: Therefore, it was concluded that doping with the appropriate amount of Co could further improve the properties of lanthanum nickelate cathode.
Titulo: Effect of the cobalt content on properties of La2Ni1-xCoxO4+δ
